steam_blade.name: Steam-Powered Blade
steam_blade.description: A gleaming sword with steam vents along the blade. It hums with mechanical power and releases small puffs of steam with each swing.

healing_tonic.name: Healing Tonic
healing_tonic.description: A crystal vial filled with golden liquid that seems to glow with its own light. The liquid swirls gently, emanating warmth.

aether_crystal.name: Aether Crystal
aether_crystal.description: A precious crystal that pulses with otherworldly energy. One of three needed to open the Gate. The air around it shimmers with power.

focus_crystal.name: Focus Enhancement Crystal
focus_crystal.description: A small crystal that amplifies magical abilities when worn. It feels warm to the touch and glows faintly blue.

mana_potion.name: Mana Restoration Potion
mana_potion.description: A swirling blue potion that restores focus and magical energy. Tiny sparkles float within the liquid.

gear_crossbow.name: Clockwork Crossbow
gear_crossbow.description: A mechanical crossbow with intricate gears and springs. It automatically reloads itself with a satisfying click.

repair_kit.name: Mechanical Repair Kit
repair_kit.description: A set of tiny tools and spare parts for quick field repairs. Contains oil, springs, and copper wire.

steam_gauntlets.name: Steam-Powered Gauntlets
steam_gauntlets.description: Heavy gauntlets powered by miniature steam engines. They increase your striking power significantly.
